author: Brodie Robertson | Linux Tips & Tricks
description:
Early this week it was announced that starting next term South Australian schools will have access to the government endorsed ChatGPT powered EdChat, and I'm sure nothing at all is going to go wrong with this.

title: I'm Sure This Experiment Can Only End Well
